JOINT SUNature of Document
The immovable property as per the schedule below was acquired by my ancestors and subsequently passed to me by inheritance and my name is Mohiddinpuram
Grama Panchayat records as Door No. 6-1E Assessment No. 476, New Assessment No. XXXX XXXX XXXX and further certified by Shri. Bogolu
Grama Revenue Officer You are my husband, and I have full and complete rights over the immovable property in my possession. Out of the natural affection I have for you, I have long desired to bequeath some immovable property to you, and I hereby transfer to you the immovable property listed below, having a market value of Rs. 3,55,000/- in letters, free of charge. I hereby transfer all my rights in the said property and this day I shall take possession of it. From now on, you shall be the sole owner of the said immovable property, with all rights of sale and gift, and you and your heirs shall enjoy it in perpetuity and in perpetuity, as you please. I have not made any other changes to the said property. Neither I nor my heirs have any objections to this. I hereby transfer all my easement rights to you without compensation. There is no other right holder to the said property except me. I do not intend to cancel or change this settlement document in any future situation. This is a settlement document of the immovable property given in writing with my consent. G. Geetha VaniSheet Endorsement

Geethavani, husband of Sai Prasad Gupta, have the right to the property listed below and I hereby certify that this is a true and correct statement. The property is located at Plot No. 6-1E, Survey No. 233-3, Bogolu Majara Mohiddinpuram Village, Ardhaveedu Mandal, Mohiddinpuram Village Panchayat, Markapuram District, and is bounded by the ACC Reekula Shed and the land bearing the old assessment number 476 and the present assessment number XXXX XXXX XXXX. 46.20 feet North-South: 16.50 feet Area of land measuring 83.49 sq.m.
The property mentioned above, with a 375 sq.m. ACC sheet shed constructed on the said land, is hereby certified in writing by the authority of G. Geethavani
husband Sai Prasad Gupta as the property within the limits shown above.

sections.content: The property covered under Gift Settlement Deed No. 214 of 2026, dated 24-Jan-2026, executed by G.Geethavani in favour of her Husband, K.Sai Prasad Gupta towards the property admeasuring an extent of 83.49 Sq.Yds, bearing house number 6-1E, Old Assessment No. 476, New Assessment No.235020000464, comprised in survey number 233-3, situated in Bogolu Majra, Mohiddin Puram Village and GramPanchayat, Ardhaveedu Mandal, within the District of Markapuram, registered at sub-registrar office Cumbum, is bounded as follows: North by: House of Bondili Gangu Bayamma South by: Site belonging to the sons of Bondili Alluraiah East by: Private way of 4½ feet width West by: A.C.C. sheet shed belongs to Nanneboyina Guravaiah

It is noted from the given documents and EC that the schedule property is not part of any active Mortgage or
Lease Deed.

Note: It is to be noted that the online EC has been verified using the key parameters, namely the Document Number, Survey Number/House Number of the concerned SRO, as per the Deed. However, cross-verification across multiple SROs has not been carried out due to the AP portal’s requirement of separate passwords for each search parameter, and the OTP-based authentication mechanism makes searches across multiple SROs operationally infeasible.
